item.title: Edit video for tiktok and reels - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone on standby to edit my videos for tiktok and reels. I want to work with someone long term. I need to see exceptional editing skills, please link your portfolio below. I am looking to hire for a "trial video" to determine If I move forward after results, then I will need 30 videos for one month. I need videos edited asap once messaged.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Music Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
